ENGLISH: Establish the People's Republic of China

With our control over most of mainland China secured, and the remaining KMT forces in disarray, we can now formally establish the People's Republic of China and begin a new chapter in China's history free from imperialist interference.
The time has come to declare a ceasefire with the remaining KMT forces on Taiwan, although this need not mark the end of our aim of eventual unification.
Send a fleet to blockade the Taiwan strait

Although the KMT government has been forced to retreat to Taiwan, we can draw a line in the sand against further Communist encroachment by sending a fleet to blockade the Taiwan Strait and prevent any Communist landing attempts.
